Question: OptySun CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
OptySun

Product: OptySun CES 2024

- OptySun bottle for disinfection and extending the shelf life of safe drinking water
- OptySun filter, a portable solution for full-cycle on-site water treatment
- Received the CES 2024 Innovation Award for outstanding design and engineering in consumer technology products
- Attended CES as part of the Ukrainian delegation and received valuable insights and knowledge
- Offers individual and group solutions for clean water access
- Aims to inspire a positive shift in water consumption culture and promote ecological practices
- Committed to continuously improving and growing their offerings
- Contact for scheduling a meeting: LinkedIn Bohdan Vorobiov, Roman Tomashevskyi or email at info@optysun.com
Summary_cn:
OptySun

产品：OptySun CES 2024

- OptySun瓶子用于消毒和延长安全饮用水的保质期
- OptySun过滤器，一个便携的全周期现场水处理解决方案
- 获得CES 2024创新奖，以杰出的设计和工程为消费者技术产品
- 作为乌克兰代表团的一部分参加CES，并获得宝贵的见解和知识
- 提供个人和团体的清洁水解决方案
- 旨在激励水消费文化积极转变，并推广生态实践
- 致力于不断改进和壮大他们的产品
- 联系安排会议：Linkedin Bohdan Vorobiov，Roman Tomashevskyi或发送电子邮件至info@optysun.com
